scopecontent.p: The collection consists primarily of a ledger for George D. Wetherill & Co., Wholesale Druggist Philadelphia, 1840-1848. It includes copies of outgoing letters, with price lists, terms, and requests for payment of outstanding accounts, as well as lists of stock, and customer accounts. There is also a receipt book for payments made by George D. Wetherill & Co., 1900-1907.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
